00020 #define SIZE (1<<16)
00021 extern unsigned short stable[SIZE];
00022 extern unsigned short lookupmasks[4][3];
00023 extern unsigned short outputmasks[4];
00024 
00025 /*
00026  * input and output lookup masks
00027  */
00028 
00029 /* s1+s2 */
00030 #define LOOK00  0x0036
00031 #define LOOK01  0x06c0
00032 #define LOOK02  0x6900
00033 #define OUT0    0x000f
00034 
00035 /* s3+s4 */
00036 #define LOOK10  0x5048
00037 #define LOOK11  0x2106
00038 #define LOOK12  0x8411
00039 #define OUT1    0x00f0
00040 
00041 /* s5+s7 */
00042 #define LOOK20  0x8601
00043 #define LOOK21  0x4828
00044 #define LOOK22  0x10c4
00045 #define OUT2    0x3300
00046 
00047 /* s6+s8 */
00048 #define LOOK30  0x2980
00049 #define LOOK31  0x9011
00050 #define LOOK32  0x022a
00051 #define OUT3    0xcc00
00052 
00053 #define ROUNDS 32
00054 #define KSIZE (ROUNDS*3)
00055 typedef struct mcg_key {
00056         unsigned short val[KSIZE];
00057 } mcg_key;
